Class.ClassComment: ExceptionalFunction /** * An interface that captures a unit of work against an item where an exception might be thrown. * @param < S > The argument type for the function. * @param < T > The return type for the function. * @param < E > The exception type that the function throws. */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Performs a unit of work on item, possibly throwing {@code E} in the process. * @param item The item to perform work against. * @return The result of the computation. * @throws E if there was a problem performing the work. */
